settings.name: Peruvian Pima cotton
settings.des: Peruvian Pima cotton is celebrated for its softness and durability. It resists fraying and fading, ensuring longevity, while its breathability offers comfort in warm weather and its natural sheen adds elegance.

settings.name: Baruffa merino woolÂ
settings.des: Baruffa merino wool is celebrated for its warmth and moisture-wicking abilities, making it perfect for comfort and style. Its fine, elastic fibers ensure a soft, itch-free fit, while being breathable enough to keep you cozy in winter and cool in summer.

settings.name: Cashmere Wool
settings.des: Cashmere wool is famous for its incredible warmth and softness, making it ideal for cold days. It's lightweight yet highly insulating, offering a luxurious feel for winter wear. Its natural stretch ensures a great fit, while the rich texture adds elegance to any outfit.
